titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology, e16508: Portions of Gen. 50.17b - Ex. 3.2

notesStmt.note: Parts of the innermost sheet of a vellum quire. Two columns per page, 21 lines per column, each page 21 cm long by 19 cm wide; side margins are 2.5 cm. 1.75 cm. between the columns; upper and lower margins are 2.5 cm. Triangular fragment from upper inner corner of the inner column of first leaf; most of the following leaf intact. Both side and upper margins contain Masoretic notes in the same ink as the text. Some of the notes are the same as found in Biblica Hebraica 3. Not yet fully catalogued. Metadata based on image and Advanced Papyrological Information System (APIS) data. Title based on Prof. Robert A. Kraft's 1990 survey of University Museum Hebrew Manuscripts. Upper portion badly damaged.

msIdentifier.repository: University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology

history.provenance: University of Pennsylvania Museum, Ellen W. Harrison Collection. Purchased from Prof. Moritz of Cairo through W.M. Muller, 1910.
